attributes.action: Reconsider if our current police service are the right organisation to be the only people to have access to arms and ammunition
attributes.additional_details: There are regular and increasingly concerning reports of dishonesty and subterfuge amongst our police forces which indicate their agenda is not one of protecting the people and society of this country.  Take the thousands of weapons currently entrusted to our police forces and set up an armed force using redundant soldiers available to the police but under the command of the Home Secretary COMPLETELY out of any command and control structure when not deployed to use their weapons in support of police operations. Our police forces CANNOT any longer be trusted to be the armed force in this land.
